website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Kumo Lyte is a neutral running shoe intended for runners who do not overpronate. It incorporates a lightweight midsole for long-lasting comfort and breathable top for continuous airflow. It helps runners and athletes achieve optimal performance.
pros: The Asics Gel Kumo Lyte is supportive, some users claimed
Many runners testified that this running partner is comfortable
Several reviewers admired the overall quality of the shoe
It is an excellent everyday running shoe, said some commenters
This shoe is also suitable for workouts and casual walks
cons: The Asics Gel Kumo Lyte is a bit narrow, according to a couple of buyers
A user complained that the narrow forefoot causes a lot of pain

customer_reviews.title: Middle school boy approved!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my pre-teen son. He loved the color combo. His only complaint was the back of the shoe. If he wears lower socks, the back of the shoe rubs against his ankle. Not enough to give him a blister, but enough that he noticed. He’s an active kid and said the shoes have plenty of cushion and flexibility. Great fit for his growing foot!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: They wear out super quick
customer_reviews.text: They wear out too quickly. 200lbs, I walk ~2miles everyday in them. The center of the sole wears out first, then the front toe, & the edges of the soles next. They currently have about 1/3 the material left, after 70 days of use, but the top of the toe cover has worn through as well. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: john anthony

customer_reviews.title: Sell previously worn product as new at new price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these delivered today and could immediately tell they had been worn. You could tell by the toe creases on both shoes, the way the laces were tied, no tags or paper in or on the shoes and white lint inside the shoes. Advertised and sold as new at new price. Obviously not new and previously worn. Pretty gross to get sent footwear worn by another person. I also read through other reviews and found several that had also been sent used product. So, this is an obvious practice by this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Its are finding good looking shoes in 4E but these look very nice. They fit really nice and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: So far, so goid
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying the ASICS brand. So far, so good. Fit and comfort are very good. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J Haze

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great! Arrived quickly and it was a lifesaver considering covid situation with stores being shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my husband and they are great!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good support. We ordered extra wide and they fit very good.
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka J Szymanska

customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, a bit stiff at first, breakfast ng in good though
customer_reviews.author: Phillip E Carter

customer_reviews.title: The price was right.
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and look great, however there is a strange and kind of annoying amount of fabric on the side that snaps and clicks when I walk. I plan to walk around my house for a few hours and see if that stops. I have had more than 20 pairs of acics and this is the first pair to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim & Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: There wasn’t much to like about these shoes. I used them for about two months before I finally broke down and replaced them. The laces hold the tightness, but are a huge pain if you need to loosen and tighten them on a recurring basis. The padding moved funny under both feet, and over the course of a half an hour run led to a fair bit of foot discomfort. Every time I tried to walk in them (I walk on my running off days) they caused blisters on the back of my heel, no matter how tightly I tied them. Glad to finally be rid of them. I typically get good use out of ASICS, but these were awful.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Nate

product_meta.title: Asics - Mens Gel-Kumo Lyte Sneaker
product_meta.description: Experience advanced running shoe technology with the GEL-KUMOLYTE running shoe from ASICS. Enjoy comfort underfoot, thanks to the placement of GEL technology under the heel. A lightweight midsole foam also works strategically with all the joints in your feet for a more flexible and tactile ride. A molded sockliner is contoured to better match the natural shap of your foot, while the full underfoot rubber better resists wear while delivering stronger propulsion. The support panel in the midfoot also increases stability and helps prevent your feet from twisting, keeping them centered on top of the midsole platform. With a trendy design thrown in the mix, GEL-KUMOLYTE running shoe has all grounds covered when it comes to comfort, style and stability.
